rows.segment_description: The Intelligent Cloud segment includes Microsoft’s public, private, and hybrid server products and cloud services that support modern business and developer needs. It encompasses server products such as SQL Server, Windows Server, Visual Studio, and System Center, as well as cloud services including Azure, GitHub, and Nuance Healthcare cloud services. This segment also provides enterprise and partner services like Enterprise Support Services, Industry Solutions, and Microsoft Partner Network to assist customers in deploying and managing Microsoft server and AI solutions.

The More Personal Computing segment focuses on products and services that enhance the personal computing experience, including Windows operating system licensing, devices such as Surface, and PC accessories. It also includes the Gaming business with Xbox hardware, content, and services like Xbox Game Pass and Xbox Cloud Gaming, as well as Search and news advertising through Bing, Microsoft Edge, and Microsoft Copilot. This segment aims to deliver consistent, secure, and engaging experiences across devices and platforms.
key_products_services: Windows OEM licensing (Windows Pro and non-Pro)
rows.primary_source: SEC 10-K More Personal Computing segment description

rows.segment_description: The Productivity and Business Processes segment offers a portfolio of productivity, communication, and information services across devices and platforms. It includes Microsoft 365 Commercial and Consumer products and cloud services, LinkedIn’s professional networking and monetized solutions, and Dynamics products and cloud services for business applications. This segment integrates AI-powered tools and cloud-based applications to enhance productivity, collaboration, and business management for organizations and individuals.
rows.primary_source: SEC 10-K Productivity and Business Processes segment description

rows.segment_description: The Other segment includes various Microsoft products and services that complement the main business segments, such as Microsoft 365 Commercial and Consumer products, LinkedIn’s monetized solutions, and Dynamics cloud and on-premises business applications. It highlights AI-enabled productivity tools, cloud services, and professional networking solutions designed to empower users and organizations. This segment also covers competition and integration aspects across Microsoft’s broad product portfolio.
